title: Integration selection
description:
Now you can select in custom mode how do you want EmuDeck to integrate into your system, from a low level using ESDE to a Highest level using SteamRomManager by incorporating your games directly into Steam.

In easy mode it defaults to ESDE and SteamRomManager is not installed. We've also added a video explaining how to run your games at the end of the installation depending of the level of integration selected

title: Automatic ESDE ➡️ Steam
description: SteamRomManager is no longer needed to add ESDE or Pegasus to your Steam library, simply by installing ESDE it will be added automatically for you

title: Bios Checker
description: We've revamped the tool so it takes into account the different Switch emulators

title: BYO Citron Support
description: Bring Your Own Citron is now available, just place the citron.appImage in your Applications folder and apply configs for SRM and ESDE from Manage Emulators. We won't install the emulator, every user must provide its own copy

title: New EmuDeck settings location
description: We are migrating your home/emudeck folder to .config/EmuDeck folder to declutter your user folder. This won't affect any emulator, games or saves and it's 100% automatically done when launching this release
